mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, title, description, status_id as statusId, due_date as dueDate FROM TASK
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Task( user_id, title, description, status_id, due_date ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{statusId}, #{dueDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Task SET user_id = #{userId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, status_id = #{statusId}, due_date = #{dueDate} WHERE id = #{id}
